name: Streaming beam Java Regional structured DLP flex template
description: Streaming beam Java structured DLP flex template with support for global and regional resources.

parameters.name: deidentifyTemplateName
parameters.label: DLP structured de-identification template name.
parameters.helpText: Name of the DLP Structured De-identification Template. Format is 'projects/<PROJECT>/locations/<LOCATION>/deidentifyTemplates/<TEMPLATE_ID>'

parameters.name: batchSize
parameters.label: DLP batch size.
parameters.helpText: Number of records to be sent in a batch in the call to the DLP API. Default value is 100.

parameters.name: dlpLocation
parameters.label: DLP location.
parameters.helpText: The Location of the DLP template resource.

parameters.name: dlpProjectId
parameters.label: DLP project ID.
parameters.helpText: ID of the project that holds the DLP template.

parameters.name: bqProjectId
parameters.label: BigQuery project ID.
parameters.helpText: ID of the project for output BigQuery.
